entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Risk of freezing rain late this morning. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. Forecast issued 05:05 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:05 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
